text: Deho’yam sādhanam mukter na bhoga-mātra-sādhanam । \nDurlabho _____ vāram-vāram na labhyate _____
Laukiko vyavahāras-tu _____ । \nNaiva sa paramam lakṣhyam asya manuṣhya-janmanaha _____
Nāshāya sarva-doṣhāṇām brahma-sthiter avāptaye । \_____ Bhagavato bhaktim asya dehasya lambhanam _____
Sarvam idam hi satsangāl-labhyate nishchitam janaihi । \nAtah sadaiva satsangah _____ mumukṣhubhihi _____
Satsangasyā’sya vignānam mumukṣhūṇām bhaved iti । \nShāstram Satsanga-Dīkṣheti shubhā’shayād virachyate _____
Satyasya svātmanah sangah satyasya Paramātmanah । \nSatyasya cha guroh sangah sach-chhāstrāṇām _____ cha _____
_____ idam satyam satsangasya hi lakṣhaṇam । \nKurvan-nevam vidham divyam satsangam syāt sukhī janaha _____
_____ dṛuḍha-sankalpah sa-shraddham nishchayo’chalaha । \nSamyak samarpaṇam prītyā niṣhṭhā vratam dṛuḍhāshrayaha _____
Satsangā’dhikṛutah sarve sarve _____ । \nSarve’rhā brahmavidyāyām nāryash-chaiva narās-tathā _____
Naiva nyūnādhikatvam syāt satsange _____ । \nSva-sva-maryādayā sarve bhaktyā muktim samāpnuyuhu _____
Sarve’dhikāriṇo mokṣhe gṛuhiṇas-tyāgino’pi cha । \nNa nyūnā’dhikatā tatra _____ bhaktā yatah Prabhoho _____
Gurum Brahmaswarūpam tu vinā na sambhaved bhave । \_____ brahmavidyāyāh sākṣhātkāro hi jīvane _____
Nottamo nirvikalpash-cha _____ Paramātmanaha । \nNa svātma-brahma-bhāvo’pi Brahmā’kṣharam gurum vinā _____
Naivā’pi tattvato bhaktih paramānanda-prāpaṇam । \nNā’pi trividha-tāpānām nāsho Brahma-gurum _____ _____
Atah samāshrayen-nityam pratyakṣham _____ gurum । \nSarva-siddhi-karam divyam Paramātmā’nubhāvakam _____
